title: Stock EDA
text:
Note



This report is parameterized. Example: -P symbol:MSFT -P start_date:2019-01-01 -P end_date:2025-08-01 -P rolling:30.

title: Stock EDA
text:
Setup

# Default values (overridden by -P at render time)
symbol = "AAPL"
start_date = "2018-01-01"
end_date = ""          # empty means "open ended"
rolling = 20


import pandas as pd
start = pd.to_datetime(start_date) if start_date else None
end   = pd.to_datetime(end_date) if end_date else None
roll  = int(rolling)
print("Using params:", dict(symbol=symbol, start=start, end=end, rolling=roll))

Using params: {'symbol': 'AAPL', 'start': Timestamp('2018-01-01 00:00:00'), 'end': None, 'rolling': 20}
